statements: SELECT product_name, product_price FROM products;
SELECT * FROM products WHERE product_id = '3edc1449-d2ad-40b6-8edf-f9d3c010afc7';
SELECT product_name, product_description, product_price FROM products WHERE product_price > 100;
SELECT product_name, product_description FROM products ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT product_id, blockchain_hash FROM products ORDER BY production_date DESC;
SELECT product_name, product_price FROM products WHERE product_price > 100 ORDER BY product_price DESC
SELECT * FROM products WHERE production_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY production_date DESC
SELECT product_id, product_name, product_price FROM products WHERE blockchain_hash IS NOT NULL ORDER BY product_id ASC
SELECT product_description FROM products WHERE LENGTH(product_description) > 100 LIMIT 5
SELECT product_id, product_name, production_date FROM products WHERE product_name LIKE '%organic%'
SELECT * FROM product;
SELECT product_name, description FROM product WHERE id = 1;
SELECT q.*, p.product_name FROM quality_control q JOIN product p ON q.product_id = p.id;
SELECT product_name FROM product WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT qc_status, qc_date, inspector_name FROM quality_control ORDER BY qc_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM product WHERE id = 1;
SELECT product_name, description FROM product WHERE id > 2 ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT qc_status, inspector_name FROM quality_control WHERE qc_status = 'Passed' AND qc_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM product JOIN quality_control ON product.id = quality_control.product_id WHERE qc_status = 'Failed';
SELECT product_name AS name, timestamp AS last_updated FROM product WHERE description LIKE '%important%';
SELECT * FROM products;
SELECT product_name, product_type FROM products WHERE product_type = 'Electronics';
SELECT location_name, city, country FROM locations WHERE city = 'New York';
SELECT product_name, production_date FROM products ORDER BY production_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM quality_checks WHERE quality_result = 'Pass' ORDER BY check_date ASC;
SELECT product_name, product_type FROM products WHERE production_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM locations WHERE city = 'New York' AND country = 'USA';
SELECT product_name, production_date FROM products WHERE product_type = 'Electronics' ORDER BY production_date DESC;

SELECT qc.quality_result, p.product_name, l.location_name FROM quality_checks qc JOIN products p ON qc.product_id = p.product_id JOIN locations l ON qc.location_id = l.location_id WHERE qc.check_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';

SELECT p.product_name, l.city, qc.check_date FROM products p JOIN quality_checks qc ON p.product_id = qc.product_id JOIN locations l ON qc.location_id = l.location_id WHERE qc.quality_result = 'Pass' ORDER BY qc.check_date ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT product_id, product_name, manufacturer_id FROM product_details;
SELECT manufacturer_name, manufacturer_address FROM manufacturer;
SELECT * FROM quality_checks WHERE inspector_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT product_name, product_description FROM product_details WHERE manufacturer_id = 123;
SELECT shipment_id, shipment_date, source_location, destination_location FROM supply_chain ORDER BY shipment_date DESC;
SELECT product_name, manufacturer_name, product_description FROM product_details JOIN manufacturer ON product_details.manufacturer_id = manufacturer.manufacturer_id;
SELECT product_name, check_date, check_result, inspector_name FROM product_details JOIN quality_checks ON product_details.product_id = quality_checks.product_id;

SELECT product_name, manufacturer_name, shipment_date, source_location, destination_location FROM product_details JOIN manufacturer ON product_details.manufacturer_id = manufacturer.manufacturer_id JOIN supply_chain ON product_details.product_id = supply_chain.product_id;
SELECT * FROM quality_checks WHERE check_result = TRUE ORDER BY check_date DESC;

SELECT product_id, product_name, manufacturer_id, manufacturer_name, shipment_date FROM product_details JOIN manufacturer ON product_details.manufacturer_id = manufacturer.manufacturer_id JOIN supply_chain ON product_details.product_id = supply_chain.product_id ORDER BY shipment_date ASC, product_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM product ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT id, manufacturer, timestamp FROM product WHERE manufacturer = 'Apple';
SELECT description FROM product WHERE id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM batch WHERE production_date > '2022-01-01' AND expiry_date < '2023-01-01';
SELECT qc_result, qc_date, qc_inspector FROM quality_control ORDER BY qc_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM product ORDER BY name DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT id, name, description FROM product WHERE manufacturer = 'ABC Inc.'
SELECT * FROM batch WHERE production_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31'
SELECT qc_date, qc_inspector FROM quality_control WHERE qc_result = true ORDER BY qc_date DESC
SELECT location_id, address, city, country FROM location
